# haproxy_health (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "haproxy_health" "health" {
  name = "health"
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the health check

### Read-Only

- `health` (Boolean)
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
